com.vub.repository

Interface UserRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:

public interface UserRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,java.lang.Integer>

      • findUserByUsername

        @Query(value="SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.username = :username")
User findUserByUsername(@Param(value="username")
                            java.lang.String userName)
        Find a user with a given username in the database
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the user which needs to be found
        Returns:
        User which has been found with the given username

      • findUserByEmail

        @Query(value="SELECT u FROM User u INNER JOIN u.person p WHERE p.email = :email")
User findUserByEmail(@Param(value="email")
                         java.lang.String email)
        Find a user with a given e-mail address in the database
        Parameters:
        email - The e-mail address that belongs to a user
        Returns:
        Returns the User with the specified e-mail address
